column1: #Text=Sun Warrior says : " Those who wish to meet the masters , Ran and Shaw , will now present their fire . "
#Text=Sun Warrior chief says : " Sound the call ! "
#Text=" Aang says : " Give me some of yours .
#Text=" Zuko says : " No , just make your own .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Get some from those warriors .
#Text=" Zuko says : " These are the masters .
#Text=" Aang says : " Still think we can take 'em ?
